warp_3=`ret = GetPixel(uv_orig) - 0.004;
warp_4=`
warp_5=`
warp_6=`float2 d = texsize.zw*2;
warp_7=`float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
warp_8=`float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );

warp_10=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_11=`

warp_13=`ret.x = GetPixel(uv_red).x - 0.001;
warp_14=`
warp_15=`float2 uv_green = lerp(uv_orig,uv,1) + float2(0,1)*texsize.zw - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*texsize.zw*2;

warp_18=`//ret = 0;
warp_19=`}
comp_1=`float3 ret1, ret2, reta;
comp_2=`float2 sam;
comp_3=`shader_body
comp_4=`{
comp_5=`    sam = tex2D(sampler_main,uv*.5);
comp_6=`    ret1 = tex2D(sampler_main, float2(uv.x, uv.y));
comp_7=`    sam *= GetBlur1(uv)-GetBlur3(uv);       
comp_8=`
comp_9=`    reta = tex2D(sampler_main, sam+uv ).rgb;
comp_10=`    ret1 = reta.r * (.5*bass_att*uv_orig.y+reta) + (reta.r)*ret1;
comp_11=`    ret1 *= (ret1+1)/2; //gamma
comp_12=`
comp_13=`uv = (uv-.5)*.3+.5;
comp_14=`    sam = tex2D(sampler_main,uv*.5);
comp_15=`    ret2 = tex2D(sampler_main, float2(uv.x, uv.y));
comp_16=`    sam *= GetBlur1(uv)-GetBlur3(uv);       
comp_17=`

comp_19=`    ret2 = reta.r * (.5*bass_att*uv_orig.y+reta) + (reta.r)*ret2;
comp_20=`    ret2 *= (ret1+1); //gamma
comp_21=`
comp_22=`
comp_23=`
comp_24=`ret = max(ret1, ret2);
comp_25=`ret *= .5+.5*lum(ret);
comp_26=`//ret = (1+ret1)*ret2;
comp_27=`ret=1-ret;
comp_28=`
comp_29=`}
